name: Roadtrip (Jet Simon)
description:
Dodge barriers, cars, and giant trucks! Can you drive 1000km? It's harder than you think! Or try for your highscore in endless mode!

Controls:

Move Left/Right - A+D / Left + Right Arrows

Move Up/Down - W+S / Up + Down Arrows

E to select

ESC to exit to main menu in game

Made for Nokia Jam 3

THIS GAME IS KNOWN  TO NOT LOAD ON SOME BROWSERS DUE TO WEBGL AND UNITY, PLEASE DOWNLOAD IF THIS IS THE CASE FOR YOU!
